languages.text: "Если невольники продолжат пропадать без причины, вскоре начнутся волнения — неважно, от страха ли сгинуть или от веры в возможность побега. Чтобы прекратить это, надо надавить на заправил среди невольников — опыт подсказывает, что такие люди могут больше любого надзирателя".

"If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we must put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."
languages.original_text: "Если невольники продолжат пропадать без причины, вскоре начнутся волнения — неважно, от страха ли сгинуть или от веры в возможность побега. Чтобы прекратить это, надо надавить на заправил среди невольников — опыт подсказывает, что такие люди могут больше любого надзирателя".

traits.locale_text: "If the slaves will continue to disappear for no reason,then an unrest will soon begin — whether out of fear of disappearing or out of believing in the possibility of escape. To stop this, we have put pressure on the instigators among the slaves — my experience suggests that such people can hold more power than any warden."

"If the slaves will continue to disappear for no reason,then an unrest will soon begin — whether out of fear of disappearing or out of believing in the possibility of escape. To stop this, we have put pressure on the instigators among the slaves — my experience suggests that such people can hold more power than any warden."

"If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we must put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."

"If the slaves will continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear of disappearing themselves or out of hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we have put pressure on the slaves' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any warden."

"If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we have put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."

"If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we must put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."

"If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we must put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."

"If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we must put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."

languages.text: “如果那些囚犯继续无缘无故消失，那么动荡很快就会随之而来，无论是出于恐惧，还是出于对越狱的希望。为了遏制这种情况，我们必须向囚犯的领袖施加压力。我的经验表明，这些人比监察员说话更有分量。”
languages.original_text: "If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we must put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."

traits.locale_text: “如果那些囚犯继续无缘无故消失，那么动荡很快就会随之而来，无论是出于恐惧，还是出于对越狱的希望。为了遏制这种情况，我们必须向囚犯的领袖施加压力。我的经验表明，这些人比监察员说话更有分量。”
“如果那些囚犯继续无缘无故消失，那么动荡很快就会随之而来，无论是出于恐惧，还是出于对越狱的希望。为了遏制这种情况，我们应该向囚犯的领袖施加压力。我的经验表明，这些人比监察员说话更有分量。”

languages.text: «Si los convictos siguen desapareciendo sin motivo, pronto habrá disturbios, ya sea por miedo a desaparecer o por la esperanza de poder escapar. Para solucionar esto, debemos presionar a sus líderes: la experiencia me dice que tienen más influencia que ningún supervisor».
languages.original_text: "If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we must put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."

traits.locale_text: «Si los convictos siguen desapareciendo sin motivo, pronto habrá disturbios, ya sea por miedo a desaparecer o por la esperanza de poder escapar. Para solucionar esto, debemos presionar a sus líderes: la experiencia me dice que tienen más influencia que ningún supervisor».

languages.text: 「囚人が理由もなく姿を消し続けるのであれば、暴動が間もなく起こるだろう...それは恐怖、または脱出の可能性への期待のいずれからだ。これを阻止するために、囚人の指導者たちに圧力をかけた...私の経験では、そのような者たちはワーデンよりも大きな影響力を持っているものだからな」
languages.original_text: "If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we must put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."

traits.locale_text: 「奴隷が理由もなく姿を消し続けるのであれば、暴動が間もなく起こるだろう...それは自分たちが消されることへの恐怖、または脱出の可能性への期待のいずれからだ。これを阻止するために、奴隷の指導者たちに圧力をかけた...私の経験では、そのような者たちはワーデンよりも大きな影響力を持っているものだからな」
「奴隷が理由もなく姿を消し続けるのであれば、暴動が間もなく起こるだろう...それは自分たちが消されることへの恐怖、または脱出の可能性への期待のいずれからだ。これを阻止するために、奴隷の指導者たちに圧力をかけた...私の経験では、そのような者たちはワーデンよりも大きな影響力を持っているものだからな」

languages.text: « Si les détenus persistent à disparaître sans raison, cela augure de gros problèmes sous peu... soit parce que d'autres auront peur de disparaître, soit parce qu'ils espéreront s'évader. Pour éviter cela, il faut mettre la pression sur leurs chefs... Ils devraient avoir plus d'influence sur les détenus que n'importe quel contremaître. »
languages.original_text: "If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we must put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."

traits.locale_text: « Si les détenus persistent à disparaître sans raison, cela augure de gros problèmes sous peu... soit parce que d'autres auront peur de disparaître, soit parce qu'ils espéreront s'évader. Pour éviter cela, il faut mettre la pression sur leurs chefs... Ils devraient avoir plus d'influence sur les détenus que n'importe quel contremaître. »

languages.text: "Wenn die Sträflinge weiterhin ohne Grund verschwinden, werden die übrigen bald einen Aufstand anzetteln ... ob aus Angst oder aus Hoffnung auf Flucht. Um das zu verhindern, müssen wir Druck auf die Anführer der Sträflinge ausüben. Meine Erfahrung sagt mir, dass solche Leute mehr Einfluss haben können als jeder Aufseher."
languages.original_text: "If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we must put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Sträflinge weiterhin ohne Grund verschwinden, werden die übrigen bald einen Aufstand anzetteln ... ob aus Angst oder aus Hoffnung auf Flucht. Um das zu verhindern, müssen wir Druck auf die Anführer der Sträflinge ausüben. Meine Erfahrung sagt mir, dass solche Leute mehr Einfluss haben können als jeder Aufseher."

"Wenn die Sklaven weiterhin ohne Grund verschwinden, werden die übrigen bald einen Aufstand anzetteln — ob aus Angst, dass sie selber verschwinden könnten, oder aus Hoffnung, dass sie fliehen könnten. Um das zu verhindern, müssen wir Druck auf die Anführer der Sklaven ausüben. Meine Erfahrung sagt mir, dass solche Leute mehr Einfluss haben können als jede Wache."

languages.text: "Suçlular yok yere ortadan kaybolmayı sürdürürse yakında ya korkudan ya da kaçış ihtimaliyle doğan ümitten ötürü kargaşa çıkacaktır. Bunu önlemek için mahkûmların liderlerine baskı uygulamalıyız. Deneyimlerime göre bu kişilerin elinde en etkili gözetmenden bile daha çok nüfuz oluyor."
languages.original_text: "If the convicts continue to disappear for no reason, then unrest will soon follow — whether out of fear or hope for the possibility of escape. To stifle this, we must put pressure on the convicts' leaders — my experience suggests that such people can hold more sway than any overseer."

traits.locale_text: "Suçlular yok yere ortadan kaybolmayı sürdürürse yakında ya korkudan ya da kaçış ihtimaliyle doğan ümitten ötürü kargaşa çıkacaktır. Bunu önlemek için mahkûmların liderlerine baskı uygulamalıyız. Deneyimlerime göre bu kişilerin elinde en etkili gözetmenden bile daha çok nüfuz oluyor."
